Changeset.Change: Reformed to comply with version 2.0+ of accounting-lib dependency
Removed dependency to org.gcube.messaging.accounting-system
introduce JMS provider
Added accounting
Compliance with new storage manager API
Removed cm dependencies
Volatile storage support
Local node resolution added
Unregister node throws exception + tidying up
Mavenized
Integration with new Storage Manager
Added GetMatchingNodes implementation to IS Provider
Added CM provider implementation
Node selection support
Infrastructure scopes are ignored upon GCubeStorageSystem initialization
Fixed sms uri handling (#259)
A more descriptive error message is thrown when an operation can not find an collection for the given scope
Initialization of the Storage System fails if all collection lookup/creation steps performed during initalization for each scope fail
Support for new CM (GDL 2.0)
Reporting method now uses static service context to solve memory consumption issue
Scopes on which cm is not deployed or collection lookup or creation fails for any reason are now ignored during the initialization of Storage System
Added support for execution status reporting via gCube System Accounting
Added support for open ended host information publishing and matching
Added support in InformationSystem interface for OpenSearch queries
Added support in InformationSystem interface for Condor related queries
